snippet.title: PAPER TANKS (PRE BETA) #PaperTanks #shorts
snippet.description:
PAPER TANKS — the drawings in the notebook came to life and turned into a battlefield! 2.5D tanks in the style of drawings in a notebook.

When the lessons are boring, the hand involuntarily reaches out to draw in the fields in a notebook. As soon as the work is completed, the notebook is laid aside and real life begins on its fields.

The game is inspired by tanks from retro consoles. We took the military setting as a basis and expanded the possibilities of the classic game.

Here is a game with an unusual visual style. Everything here is presented in the form of drawings in a notebook. Also there are stationery items as shelters.

This video was made during the development of the game.

Add wishlists:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1213020/PAPER_TANKS

Follow the development of the game:
https://www.instagram.com/chill_nplay
https://twitter.com/PAPERTANKS2
https://vk.com/pt_game
